listData.name: Access Account
listData.description: Our Access account is your complete everyday transaction account.

features.additionalInfo: Make unlimited fee-free bill payments using BPAY via Internet Banking or from our app.
Make fee-free Pay anyone or BPAY transactions via Internet Banking or from our app.
Receive additional fee-free Visa Debit cards to make purchases or cash-out transactions within Australia.

features.additionalValue: The Visa Debit card can be added to Apple Pay.

features.additionalInfo: Receive a fee-free Visa Debit card to make purchases or cash-out transactions within Australia and worldwide.
Make unlimited fee-free transactions using the Visa Debit card, or via Internet Banking or Mobile Banking.
The Access Account can be linked in an offset arrangement with eligible home and investment loan held with us.

eligibility.additionalInfo: To open an account, you must be an existing customer with a valid email address and an Australian mobile number.

eligibility.additionalValue: To open an account, you must be solely a tax resident of Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: To open an account, you must be 14 years or older.

fees.name: Visa Debit card - replacement (express post)
fees.additionalInfo: Visa Debit card replacement (express post). Replacement by regular post is fee-free.

fees.name: Audit certificate
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged for Audit Certificates.

fees.name: Special answer (cheque deposits)
fees.additionalInfo: Special answer fee for cheque deposits.

fees.name: Voucher retrieval
fees.additionalValue: Voucher retrieval fee. Minimum $20.00 ($60 per hour).
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged for voucher/information retrieval by us.

fees.name: Overdrawn account
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged on overdrawn accounts (per occurrence).

fees.name: Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Dishonour fee charged on Pay anyone, BPAY, cheque and Direct Debit dishonours.

fees.name: Stop cheque fee
fees.additionalInfo: Stop cheque requests - lost or stolen. Fee is per cheque.

fees.name: Electronic transfer - Branch assisted
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged when one-off Pay anyone, BPAY, or transfers are made on behalf of customers by us.

fees.name: Periodical payment - Branch assisted
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged when periodical Pay anyone or BPAY payments are made on behalf of customers by us. Fee charged per transaction.

fees.name: Statement reissue
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged when statement is reissued on behalf of customers by us. Fee charged per statement reissue.

detailData.description: Our Access account is your complete everyday transaction account.

listData.name: Term Deposit
listData.description: A great way to reach your savings goals, with no fees and a competitive interest rate locked in for terms from 31 days to 60 months.

features.additionalInfo: Interest can be reinvested back into the Term Deposit, paid to your account with us, or paid to another financial institution account.
Manage the Term Deposit maturity instructions from within Internet Banking or our app. Tell us how the principal and interest amounts are to be paid when your Term Deposit matures.

constraints.additionalInfo: Minimum deposit amount of $25,000 applies to new customers, otherwise the minimum is $5,000.

eligibility.additionalInfo: To open an account, you must have a valid email address and an Australian mobile number.
To open a Term Deposit, you must be a natural person.
To open an account, you must be 14 years or older.

eligibility.additionalValue: To open an account, you must be solely a tax resident of Australia.

fees.name: Voucher/information retrieval.
fees.additionalValue: Voucher retrieval fee. Minimum $20.00 ($60 per hour).
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged for voucher/information retrieval by us.

fees.name: Early Redemption administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: An Administration fee of $30 is applied at the time of the time of early withdrawal.

listData.name: Premium Reverse Mortgage
listData.description: Our Heartland Premium Reverse Mortgage is designed specifically for customers with a property in Sydney or Melbourne valued at over $10 million. Aged care and secondary property options are available.

features.additionalInfo: Fee free additional repayments
View your reverse mortgage online or via mobile app.
Voluntary payments can be redrawn, subject to credit approval at time of request. Minimum redraw $2,500.
A facility you can apply for that provides regular monthly, quarterly, or yearly payments for up to ten years.
A facility you can apply for that allows you to request additional funds for future needs, subject to credit approval at time of draw-down.

eligibility.additionalValue: Reside and own property in Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicant can't currently be declared bankrupt.

eligibility.additionalValue: Applicant(s) can be employed or retired.

eligibility.additionalInfo: If joint, one applicant can be aged 55 or greater as long as the other applicant it 60+
Lending criteria applies.
Property must be located in Sydney or Melbourne valued at over $10 million.
LVR conditions apply.

fees.name: Registration and Discharge of Mortgage fee
Discharge administration fee (payable when discharging a mortgage held with us)
fees.additionalInfo: Covers administration and settlement costs. Payable at settlement.

fees.name: Equity protection option fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request the Equity protection option to protect up to 50% equity in your property.

fees.name: Documentation re-issue fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if you request we re-issue loan documents.

fees.name: Settlement arrangement fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if attendance at settlement is required.

fees.name: Cash reserve drawdown or re-draw fee other than online
fees.additionalInfo: Charged each time you request a cash reserve drawdown or re-draw from your reverse mortgage.

fees.name: Further advance fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if you request a further advance on an existing reverse mortgage.

fees.name: Variation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request we vary your reverse mortgage.

fees.name: Application fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee payable on settlement and deducted from the initial advance.

lendingRates.additionalValue: Interest is adjusted monthly 4.50% above the 90- day bank bill rate. Any change is based on the published 90-day bank bill on first business day of month, with the change occurring on the 15th calendar day of each month.
lendingRates.additionalInfo: LVR conditions apply. Principal and interest are payable at the end of the loan.

lendingRates.additionalValue: Interest is adjusted monthly 4.50% above the 90- day bank bill rate. Any change is based on the published 90-day bank bill on first business day of month, with the change occurring on the 15th calendar day of each month.
lendingRates.additionalInfo: Rate applies to our Aged Care Option loan. LVR conditions apply. Principal and interest are payable at the end of the loan.

lendingRates.additionalValue: Interest is adjusted monthly 4.50% above the 90- day bank bill rate. Any change is based on the published 90-day bank bill on first business day of month, with the change occurring on the 15th calendar day of each month.
lendingRates.additionalInfo: Rate applies to our Secondary Property loan. LVR conditions apply. Principal and interest are payable at the end of the loan.

features.additionalInfo: Fee free repayments.
View your reverse mortgage online or via mobile app.

eligibility.additionalValue: Reside and own property in Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicant can't currently be bankrupt
If joint both applicants must be aged 60 or greater.
Lending criteria applies.

eligibility.additionalValue: Applicant(s) can be employed or retired.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Home must be valued at $400,000 or more.
LVR conditions apply.

fees.name: Application fee

listData.name: Reverse Mortgage
listData.description: Our Heartland Standard Reverse Mortgage helps retirees achieve a more comfortable retirement by releasing equity in their property, while continuing to own it.

features.additionalInfo: Fee free additional repayments.
View your reverse mortgage online or via mobile app.
Voluntary payments can be redrawn, subject to credit approval at time of request. Minimum redraw $2,500.
A facility you can apply for that provides regular monthly, quarterly or yearly payments for up to ten years.
A facility you can apply for that allows you to request additional funds for future needs, subject to credit approval at time of draw-down.

eligibility.additionalValue: Reside and own property in Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicant can't currently be declared bankrupt.

eligibility.additionalValue: Applicant(s) can be employed or retired.

eligibility.additionalInfo: If joint, one applicant can be aged 55 or greater as long as the other applicant is aged 60+.
Lending criteria applies.
LVR conditions apply.

fees.name: Application/Settlement fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee payable on settlement of the reverse mortgage and deducted from the initial advance.

fees.name: Registration and Discharge of Mortgage fee
Discharge administration fee (payable when discharging a reverse mortgage held with us)
fees.additionalInfo: Covers administration and settlement costs. Payable at settlement.

fees.name: Equity protection option fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request the Equity protection option to protect up to 50% equity in your property.

fees.name: Re-issue of loan documentation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if you request we re-issue loan documents.

fees.name: Settlement arrangement fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if attendance at settlement is required.

fees.name: Cash reserve drawdown or re-draw fee other than online
fees.additionalInfo: Charged each time you request a cash reserve drawdown or re-draw from your reverse mortgage.

fees.name: Further advance fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if you request a further advance on an existing reverse mortgage.

fees.name: Variation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request we vary your reverse mortgage or title.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Rate applies to our Standard Reverse Mortgage product. Principal and interest are payable at the end of the loan.
Rate applies to our Secondary Property loan. LVR conditions apply. Principal and interest are payable at the end of the loan.
